description:
With an innovative design, the JetForce Pro 25L is light, compact, and dependable. A rechargeable high-speed fan system lets you deploy the float system without the need to carry cartridges. Your snow safety essentials get their own purpose-built pocket for quick access, plus 25L of cargo capacity. In conditions that can be unpredictable to even the most experienced explorers, this bag adds another margin of safety.

  • Redesigned JetForce technology allows repeatable airbag deployment in the event of an avalanche
  • Modular design lets you interchange with 10L or 35L booster options (sold separately)
  • Fixed leg loop to ensure the pack stay on you when you need it to
  • Adjustable sternum strap for a snug fit
  • Avy-gear specific pocket for your snow safety essentials
  • Padded hipbelt with stash pocket
  • Internal accessories pocket
  • USB rechargeable with Bluetooth update capability
name: Black Diamond Jetforce Pro 25L Airbag - Unisex
